ITEM_TYPES.title: Saiyan Armor
ITEM_TYPES.description: When equipped, the character gets a +1 to defense.
ITEM_TYPES.lore: Armor worn by Saiyan Warriors, featuring broad shoulder pads and pointed fauld.

ITEM_TYPES.title: Scouter
ITEM_TYPES.description: When equipped, the character gets a +1 to accuracy and a -1 to spirit.
ITEM_TYPES.lore: A device worn on the ear by Saiyan Warriors. A piece of colored glass covers an eye and a metal housing covers the ear. Used to identify power levels but is notoriously faulty.

ITEM_TYPES.title: Senzu Bean
ITEM_TYPES.description: Hp becomes set to full, archetype counters become set to max.
ITEM_TYPES.lore: A mystical bean cultivated by Korin atop Korin, especially rare and helpful during battles for the fate of the earth.

ITEM_TYPES.title: Turtle Hermit Gi
ITEM_TYPES.description: When equipped, the character gets a +1 to agility.
ITEM_TYPES.lore: An orange gi worn by the students of the Turtle School, trained by Master Roshi.

ITEM_TYPES.title: Power Pole
ITEM_TYPES.description: When equipped, the character gets the -PowerPoleMove- and +1 to physical attack accuracy.
ITEM_TYPES.lore: A simple red pole contained by a red sheathe worn on the back, when called upon the Power Pole can extend to extreme heights.

ITEM_TYPES.title: Demon Clan Clothes
ITEM_TYPES.description: When equipped, the character gets a +2 to defense and a -1 to agility.
ITEM_TYPES.lore: The outfit worn by the demon clan. A purple gi, pointed brown shoes and a weighted cape with broad shoulder pads. The increased weight is said to aid in training.
